name: Panoply Ltd
description: Developer of an online data warehousing platform designed to keep all the data and business intelligence tools in one place. The company's platform automates manual data-storage processes including modeling, scaling, performance and storage optimization, enabling organizations to free up their data engineering facilities and create value for their customers easily.
one_liner: Developer of an online data warehousing platform designed to keep all the data and business intelligence tools in one place. The company's platform automates manual data-storage processes including modeling, scaling, performance and storage optimization, enabling organizations to free up their data engineering facilities and create value for their customers easily.
